name: HOPE (itch) (RanceStors)
description:
The player will take role as a Tentacle Monster, and you don't know why the soldier attack yo. Thus, what you can do is eat them to protect yourself and escape this place.

Control: WASD - move control  /  Mouse - aim  /  Left Click - shoot  /  SPACE - release the tentacle  /  Esc - quit  /  R - restart

Things to Do: Player can move and explore the maps, and also player can shoot the enemy solider and eat them to strength the Monster.
